name: Dwarf
description: Stout and resolute, dwarves stand as pillars of endurance. Whether hewing stone halls or defending ancient keeps, dwarves prize tradition, craftsmanship, and clan honor.

features.name: Darkvision
features.description: You can see in dim light within 60 feet as if it were bright light, and in darkness as if it were dim light.

features.name: Stonecunning
features.description: You are proficient in History checks and gain advantage when related to stonework.

features.name: Iron Stomach
features.description: You have resistance to poison damage.
